div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 498px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 221px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;

display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 48px; height: 1px; padding-top: 105px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Gather functional requirements
• Identify non-functional requirements
• Clarify constraints and boundaries
• Understand business context

div.div:
• Research available solutions
• Evaluate against requirements
• Consider trade-offs
• Prototype if necessary

div.div:
• Present options to team
• Gather feedback
• Address concerns
• Build consensus

div.div:
• Write ADR
• Update architecture diagrams
• Communicate to affected teams
• Update project documentation

div.div:
• Track implementation progress
• Gather feedback from teams
• Measure outcomes
• Revise if needed

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 48px; height: 1px; padding-top: 300px; margin-left: 341px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #666666;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 323px; height: 1px; padding-top: 472px; margin-left: 462px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
✓ Defer decisions until the last responsible moment
✓ Make decisions reversible when possible
✓ Document rationale, not just the decision
✓ Consider both technical and business impact
✓ Involve affected stakeholders early
✓ Accept that some decisions may be wrong

switch.text: ✓ Defer decisions until the last responsible moment...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
